^x8888FF^xE05030Spectres^7:^7 Carange Chiefain (2?) Wild Brstle Matron (Tanky Defensive Spectre) Arena Master Warcaller (Onslaught, from Tattoo minions, might be unavailable without allflames) Spectral Leader (T17s, action speed buff) https://www.poewiki.net/wiki/Corpse_item (Corpses from Affliction, some coning back to ritual this league) Perfect Naval Officer (Precion + Fortification) Perfect Forest Warrior (Onslaugt + Culling Strike) Perfect Warlord (would be huge for endurance charge gen) Perfect Meatsack (40% inc minion life)
^xE05030Tattos^7 Int can be mostly replaced (Need 159 for lvl 21 gems) - Chaos Res - Lightning Res - Minion Life - Reduced Damage from Crits

Input.name: customMods
Input.string:
#Cap out your resistances #Theres plenty of open mods on gear +100% all elemental resistances +75% chaos resistance
#AG You and nearby allies gain 50% increased Damage You and nearby allies gain 18% increased Damage Nearby Enemies have 18% increased Effect of Curses on them You can apply an additional curse
